title: Cycling’s ‘Champions League’ on Hold for Now: ‘Not Much is Happening’
content:
'Unfortunately that has been at a standstill for a while,’ says Visma-Lease a Bike’s Richard Plugge who hints at possible 2026 rollout.

Read the full article at Cycling’s ‘Champions League’ on Hold for Now: ‘Not Much is Happening’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
